data.title: Ryan Hartman's goal helps Wild edge Lightning
data.description: Ryan Hartman scored the go-ahead goal midway through the third period to lift the Minnesota Wild to a 4-2 win over the visiting Tampa Bay Lightning on Sunday…
data.snippet:
Corey Perry and Alex Killorn each scored for Tampa Bay, whose three-game winning streak came to an end.
